tool_description: API -  Showing all latest Climate Changes News around the world
name: Climate Change lv
title: Climate Change lv

api_list.name: Get All Individual Source of Climate Changes News
api_list.description: Get All Individual News of Climate Changes News and the Source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-lv.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-lv.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-lv.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-lv.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Changes News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Climate Change from all over the World
